# elementPointerType()

**Instance Method**

Provides a description of the underlying pointer type when an array holds pointers as its elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func elementPointerType() -> MTLPointerType?
```

## Return Value

An object that describes the pointer. If the array elements aren’t pointers, this method returns `nil`.

## Discussion

Use this method if [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArrayType/elementType] is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType/pointer].

## Obtaining details for complex array elements

- **element()**: Provides a description of the underlying type when an array holds other arrays as its elements.
- **elementStructType()**: Provides a description of the underlying struct type when an array holds structs as its elements.
- **elementTextureReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying texture type when an array holds textures as its elements.
